entry.name: MAV_CMD_SET_CAMERA_AI_IDENTIFICATION
entry.description: Enable or disable AI identification on the camera. The camera must respond with CAMERA_AI_IDENTIFICATION_STATUS when the AI identification state changes.
entry.param: Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras attached to the autopilot, which don't have a distinct component id. 0: all cameras. This is used to target specific autopilot-connected cameras. It is also used to target specific cameras when the MAV_CMD is used in a mission.
AI identification enable/disable (o for disable, 1 for enable)

entry.name: MAV_CMD_NAV_VISNAV
entry.param: Delta Pitch = New Desired Pitch - Current Pitch

message.name: CAMERA_AI_IDENTIFICATION_INFORMATION
message.description: Information about the AI identification capabilities of the camera.
message.field: Bitmap of camera AI identification capability flags.
Camera id of a non-MAVLink camera attached to an autopilot (1-6). 0 if the component is a MAVLink camera (with its own component id).

message.name: CAMERA_AI_IDENTIFICATION_STATUS
message.description: Status of the AI identification feature.
message.field: AI identification enable/disable (0 for disable, 1 for enable)
Camera id of a non-MAVLink camera attached to an autopilot (1-6). 0 if the component is a MAVLink camera (with its own component id).
